Subskills.name: Fire Master
Subskills.description: Increases the maximum amount of fire totems.

Subskills.name: Flame Scorching
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict burning on hit.

Subskills.name: Firestorm Totems
Subskills.description: Fire totem unleashes swirling flames orbiting outwards with increased damage but decreased duration.

Subskills.name: Scattering Flames
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict fire break on hit.

Subskills.name: Overheated Flames
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt by fire totem.

Subskills.name: Burning Radius
Subskills.description: Increases the size of fire totem.

Subskills.name: Light the Soil
Subskills.description: Chance to leave ground burning beneath monsters on hit dealing additional damage.

Subskills.name: Arcfire
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash additional flames in an arc.

Subskills.name: Paralyzing Napalm
Subskills.description: Increases damage and size of flames inflicting slow on hit.

Subskills.name: Gas into the Flames
Subskills.description: Chance for flames to grow in size on hit.

Subskills.name: Totemscorch
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to burning targets.

Subskills.name: Flamescarred Sentry
Subskills.description: Fire totem now burns monsters around it for a portion of its damage.

Subskills.name: Homing Flames
Subskills.description: Flames become homing towards the nearest target dealing a portion of the damage.

Subskills.name: Multiplying Fire
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to summon an additional fire totem at the target's location for a short time.
